original: eko 'pyātmā pradeśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiryujyamānastatra baddha iva itaratra mukta iva ca gamyate /

original: yathā malīmase darpaṇatale malīmasaṃ mukhaṃ viśuddhe viśuddhaṃ darpaṇarahitaṃ ca gamyamānaṃ tadupādhidoṣāsaṃpṛktam /

original: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmo na vastu vyavasthāpayitumalam /
analyzed: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmaḥ na vastu vyavasthāpayitum alam

satyam
vibhramaḥ hi saḥ
atrā api vibhrama tvam na daṇḍa vāritam
kalpitaḥ api ca ahi daṃśaḥ maraṇa kāryāya kalpate
pratisūryakaḥ ca prakāśa kāryāya
yat api dṛśyena eva draṣṭuḥ anumānāt draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ bhedaḥ
dṛśyasya ca sukha ādi bheda upalabdheḥ nānātvam iti
tat api asat
na draṣṭari aprakāśe yatas dṛśyasya siddhiḥ asti iti uktam
dṛśya bheda upalabdhiḥ ca na asti
pramāṇasya anavacchedaka tvāt iti vakṣyate

nānātve tu vivitka svabhāvayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭa paraspara svarūpayoḥ asambaddhayoḥ kīdṛśaḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya bhāvaḥ
na hi cityā a saṃsṛṣṭam cetitam iti yujyate

a tad ātmanaḥ tad avabhāsaḥ

original: anādinidhanatve hi nāpaneyaṃ nopaneyaṃ vā kiñcidastīti tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo vyarthāḥ syuḥ /

original: na ca śāstrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam,

original: tatrāvidyayaiva vidyāpratyāsannayā vibhāgadarśanamavidyāṃ tīrtvā vidyālakṣaṇe nitye svarūpe 'vatiṣṭhate,

pratibimba kaluṣitam iva udakam tad nivṛttau
syāt etat
aikātmye vibhāgasya asatya tvāt
tad adhiṣṭhāna śravaṇa ādayaḥ api asatyāḥ katham kasmaicid kāryāya syuḥ
asatyāt ca satya pratipattiḥ mithyā eva
yathā dhūmaḥ iti mithyā gṛhītāt bāṣpāt iti
ucyate
na ayam niyamaḥ
asatyam na kasmaicid kāryāya bhavati iti

original: bhavati hi māyā prīterbhayasya ca nimittam,

yena tu rūpeṇa pratipādakāḥ tat asatyam

original: api ca abhedadarśanopāyā api na svarūpeṇa mithyā,
analyzed: api ca abheda darśana upāyāḥ api na sva rūpeṇa mithyā

na rekhāgavayaḥ gavaya tvena gavaya antarāṇām pratipatti hetuḥ

original: īdṛśīṃ rekhāṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ varṇaḥ smartavya iti /

yadi matam

original: na ca sārvajñasya jñānasya caramakṣaṇa upādānam /

original: yadā ca pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vābhisaṃdhāya kiñcitpratyakṣādibhirjijñāsyate,
analyzed: yadā ca pravṛttim nivṛttim vā abhisaṃdhāya kiñcid pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ jijñāsyate

tadā abhisaṃhite api pravṛtti nivṛttī na śabda arthau
itas ca etat evam itas ca tat evam
yat kasyacid upādāna buddhiḥ
anyasya upekṣā
śabda artha tve hi sarveṣām upādāna buddhiḥ eva syāt
na ca pravartaka vākya vyavahārāt eva sambandha avagamaḥ
yena pravṛtti para tā eva avagamyeta
anyathā api darśanāt

original: vyutpannavibhaktyarthaśca yatpacatyarthe karaṇaṃ paśyati tasya kāṣṭhaprātipadikārthatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: vyutpanna vibhakti arthaḥ ca yat pacati arthe karaṇam paśyati tasya kāṣṭha prātipadika artha tām pratipadyate

original: tathā harṣaviṣādāśvāsaprayojanebhyaḥ tattvākhyānebhyo harṣādinimitteṣu bhavati vyutpattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā harṣa viṣāda āśvāsa prayojanebhyaḥ tattva ākhyānebhyaḥ harṣa ādi nimitteṣu bhavati vyutpattiḥ
yathā eva hi pravṛtti viśeṣa darśanāt viśiṣṭa pravṛtti pratyayaḥ tad nimitta pratyayaḥ vā anumīyate
hetu antara abhāvāt śabda ānantaryāt śabdasya tatra sāmarthyam kalpyate
tathā harṣa ādi upalabdheḥ harṣa ādi nimitta pratyaya anumānam
śabda ānantaryāt ca śabdasya tatra sāmarthya kalpanā
pramāṇa antareṇa ca putra janmanaḥ harṣa nimittasya tasya avagata tvāt anyasya abhāvāt

original: putraste jātaḥ'itīdaṃ vākyamāptena tatra putrajanmani prayuktamiti pratipadyate /
analyzed: putraḥ te jātaḥ iti idam vākyam āptena tatra putra janmani prayuktam iti pratipadyate
putra janma eva ca asmāt vākyāt anena pratītam iti avadhārayati
tat evam prayoga pratyayābhyām asmin arthe vākyasya sāmarthyam pratipadyate
bhavatu vā loke sarva vacasām pravartaka tā
tatas ca sambandha avagamaḥ
tathā api idam vicāryam
kim vidhāyaka pada vyatirekiṇām padānām svārtha mātra para tā
āhosvit kārya artha saṃsarga para tā
uta padārtha mātra saṃsarga para tā iti

original: tatra svārthamātraparyavasāne vākyārthapratyayābhāvaḥ prayogavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt /
analyzed: tatra sva artha mātra paryavasāne vākya artha pratyaya abhāvaḥ prayoga vaiyarthyam ca syāt
tasmāt anya artha vyatiṣaṅga para tā
tāvatā prayoga pratyayayoḥ upapattau na viśeṣa vyatiṣaṅge pramāṇam asti
yaḥ hi viśeṣa vyatiṣaṅgam kalpayati
kalpayati asau artha antara vyatiṣaṅgam
tathā ca vinā api kāryeṇa padārthānām paraspara saṃsargāt viśiṣṭa bhūta artha pratyaya siddhiḥ
avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam
anyathā loke vivakṣā para tvāt padārtha anvayasya
tad abhāvāt vede veda artha pratītiḥ na syāt

original: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryānvayitve parasparaṃ padārthānāmanabhisambandhaḥ /

tatra na viśiṣṭa padārtha viṣayaḥ niyogaḥ pratīyeta
eka padārtha sādhyaḥ eva syāt
atha na viniyoga pratyarthī niyogaḥ
viśiṣṭa viṣaya tvāt
pūrvaḥ tarhi viniyogaḥ
paścāt niyogaḥ

original: kimataḥ? asti niyogātiriktārthānvaye 'pi padasya sāmarthyaṃ niyogānapekṣaṃ ca,

paraspara anvitānām i yoga anvayāt

original: tathā vidhiniṣedhacodanāsvapi naisargikīṇāṃ rāgādinibandhanānāṃ pravṛttīnāṃ pravilayaḥ /

original: 'yena kenacana yajetāpi darvīhomenānupahatamanā eva bhavati'; iti ca /

a mahāyajñaiḥ ca yajñaiḥ ca brāhmī iyam kriyate tanuḥ

original: anye tu parasparavirodhinoḥ karmātmajñānayoḥ dvaitādvaitaviṣayatvenāsaṃbandha eveti manyante /

na api ātma jñāna vidhiḥ yathā udita brahmacarya ādi sādhana nirākāṅkṣaḥ karma vidhīn apekṣate
tatra kutas eka adhikāra tvam
yadi manyeta anavagata kāryā atha anavagata edition
eva karma ādi vidhayaḥ
svarga ādīnām guṇa tvena saṃbandhāt iti
svarga kāma adhikaraṇam asmai vyācakṣīta

original: api ca sarvavidhiniṣedhānāṃ nāmarūpapravilayakāryāpavargitve jantūnāmabhyudayavinipātā akarmanimittā ākasmikāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: api ca sarva vidhi niṣedhānām nāma rūpa pravilaya kārya apavargi tve jantūnām abhyudaya vinipātāḥ akarma nimittāḥ ākasmikāḥ syuḥ
tathā apavargaḥ api syāt iti vaiyarthyam śāstrasya api
atha svarga ādi kārya dvāreṇa karma vidhīnām jñāna adhikāra anupraveśi tā mārga grāma gamana upadeśānām iva abhimata nagara gamana upadeśa anupraveśi tvam
tat asat
yuktam mārga grāma prāpteḥ anabhimata deśa prāpti upadeśa anupraveśi tvam
na hi mārga grāma upadeśeṣu puruṣa artha prāptiḥ
atas sākāṅkṣa tvāt yatra puruṣa artha prāptiḥ
tam anupraviśanti
na tu evam karma vidhiṣu puruṣa arthasya alābhaḥ
svarga ādīnām puruṣeṇa arthyamāna tvāt

original: tatra ca nairākāṅkṣye kathamanyānupraveśaḥ? atha matam ---
analyzed: tatra ca nairākāṅkṣye katham anya anupraveśaḥ atha matam
yadā upacchandya nīyate uttara uttara grāma guṇa upadarśanena abhipretam deśam

yuktam tatra api pramāṇa antareṇa vaktuḥ abhiprāya adhigamāt
pramāṇa antareṇa hi tatra idam adhigatam
etad deśa prāptau idam asya samīhitam vaktuḥ saṃpadyate
tasmāt idam asya vivakṣitam iti
na tu śabda vṛtti mātra anusāreṇa śabda pravṛtti mātrā
śabda vṛtta mātrā
itas ca etat evam

original: [KKS_29] yatpratigrāmaṃ vaktuḥ śrotuśca satyāmarthaprāptau pramāṇāntareṇānadhigate paradeśaprāptyabhiprāye pūrvopadeśān pūrvārthāneva pārśvasthāḥ  #
analyzed: yat pratigrāmam vaktuḥ śrotuḥ ca satyām artha prāptau pramāṇa antareṇa anadhigate para deśa prāpti abhiprāye pūrva upadeśān pūrva arthān eva pārśva sthāḥ

original: dvitīyo 'pi kalpo varṇitādeva kāmānāṃ kāmanibarhaṇasāmarthyābhāvātsvakāryanirākāṅkṣāṇāṃ cānyānupraveśe pramāṇabhāvādasamañjasaḥ /

original: tatra hi prakaraṇātprakṛtakarmāpūrvalakṣaṇāparo brīhiśabdaḥ svasvarūpa ānarthakyātprakṛtāpūrvasambandhaṃ bodhayati /

na api yathā ayasya parṇa mayī juhūḥ bhavati iti
tatra hi juhū ādi avyabhicarita karma sambandham asati api prakaraṇe karma upasthāpayati

asaṃbhave vā mithyātvam
atha bahuvidha tvāt pravṛtti hetūnām vyabhicārāt aśabda artha tve pravṛtti hetu sāmānyam śabda arthaḥ

original: tatra vede laukikānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmasaṃbhavādalaukikaṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: tatra vede laukikānām viśeṣaṇānām asaṃbhavāt alaukikam viśeṣa antaram pratīyate

original: evamapi yaḥ śabdārtho vede sāmānyaṃ sa lokasiddha iti nānuvādatā vyāvartate padārthāntaravat /
analyzed: evam api yaḥ śabda arthaḥ vede sāmānyam sa loka siddhaḥ iti na anuvāda tā vyāvartate padārtha antara vat

original: yo 'pi viśeṣaḥ so 'nyāsaṃbhavena pariśeṣānumānagocara iti na pramāṇāntarāviṣayatvam /
analyzed: yaḥ api viśeṣaḥ saḥ anya asaṃbhavena pariśeṣa anumāna gocaraḥ iti na pramāṇa antara aviṣaya tvam
na ca pariśeṣa anumānam api śreyaḥ sādhana tāyāḥ saṃbhavāt
atha matam
loka vyavahāraḥ iva veda vyavahāraḥ api anādiḥ

original: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukikapravṛttihetvabhāvādalaukike [KKS_106] tu pravṛttihetau vaidikānāṃ vidhāyakānāṃ saṃbandhajñānam /
analyzed: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukika pravṛtti hetu abhāvāt alaukike tu pravṛtti hetau vaidikānām vidhāyakānām saṃbandha jñānam
na ca anumeya tvam
tad pratyayasya pravṛttyā anumānāt
tad siddhiḥ tu tad pratyaya sāmarthyena eva
sa ca pratyayaḥ śabda utthaḥ iti ananya pramāṇa tā

original: na ca laukikasyaiva śreyaḥsādhanatvasya saṃbhava iti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca laukikasya eva śreyaḥ sādhana tvasya saṃbhavaḥ iti yuktam
laukikī hi pramāṇa antara avagamyā śreyaḥ sādhana tā

original: tatra prayogadarśanālliṅādestadanusāreṇa ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyatāpi śabdārthānupraveśinī /
analyzed: tatra prayoga darśanāt liṅ ādeḥ tad anusāreṇa ca śabda artha avadhāraṇāt pramāṇa antara gamya tā api śabda artha anupraveśinī
atra ucyate
bhavatu nāma veda vyavahārāt eva śabda artha anugamaḥ
tathā api na pramāṇa antara gocara tā vyāvartate
tathā hi

original: alaukike pravṛttihetau śabdasya sāmarthyajñānakāle pramito vā syāt, na vā?
analyzed: alaukike pravṛtti hetau śabdasya sāmarthya jñāna kāle pramitaḥ vā syāt na vā

atha na pramitaḥ
katham tatra saṃbandha jñānam

original: na hyapramitayoḥ saṃbandhinostadāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātuṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi apramitayoḥ saṃbandhinoḥ tad āśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātum śakyaḥ
yaḥ api manyate
śaktiḥ hi śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ
sā ca na arthe
tasya vyavasthita tvāt

ubhayathā ca pramāṇa antara viṣayaḥ

original: tathā na viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ hi tatra yathārthatve tathābhūtagrāhiṇī tatpratītirarthaśūnyā syāt?
analyzed: tathā na viparyāsaḥ katham hi tatra yathārtha tve tathābhūta grāhiṇī tad pratītiḥ artha śūnyā syāt
pariśeṣāt pramāṇam

original: parajñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyata iti subhāṣitam /
analyzed: para jñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyate iti subhāṣitam
atha matam
na para jñānena paraḥ pratipadyate
kim tu sva jñānena eva para jñāna sāmarthyāt
atha tasya sva jñānam katamat pramāṇam iti vācyam
na tāvat śābdam
śabda vijñānāt arthe vijñānam iti lakṣaṇāt
na ca tad śabda jñānāt
kutas tarhi
śabda uttha jñānāt anumitāt
atha tasya prāmāṇye pravṛtti hetu sadbhāva siddhiḥ
prāmāṇyam ca tasya doṣa rahita śabda udbhavāt
tena śabdasya tatra prāmāṇyam ucyate
tad adhīnaḥ tatra artha niścayaḥ iti
tat api asāṃpratam
śabdāt artha jñānam śābdam iti lakṣaṇāt
puruṣa vacanam api na arthe na pramāṇam
kim tu jñāna viśeṣaṇe
dvayī ca viśeṣaṇasya gatiḥ uktā

na ca vaktṛ jñānena eva artha siddhiḥ
para jñānena na paraḥ pratipadyate iti uktam
yat tu uktam
vaktṛ jñāna adhīnā artha siddhiḥ iti

original: tattanmithyātve tadasaṃbhave vā pramāṇapratītibādhane 'rthapratīterapi bādhanāttadabādhe cābādhāt /
analyzed: tad tad mithyātve tad asaṃbhave vā pramāṇa pratīti bādhane artha pratīteḥ api bādhanāt tad abādhe ca abādhāt
na tu vacasaḥ arthaḥ na viṣayaḥ

original: anyathā pramāṇāntaraparatantraṃ puruṣavaco 'rthe sāpekṣamityetadeva na syāt /

original: na hi yo yasyāviṣayaḥ sa tatra sāpekṣo 'napekṣo vā /

tathā ca
sthāpanam abādhaḥ

evam hi uktam

arthavatyāḥ pratīteḥ smṛti pramāṇayoḥ anyataratra antargamāt

original: yadi ca śābdapratītivyatirekiṇyāpi pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate 'pramāṇātmikayāpi,
analyzed: yadi ca śābda pratīti vyatirekiṇyā api pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate apramāṇa ātmikayā api

original: bhavatyayamaśābdasyāpi jñānasya gocara iti pramāṇāntarāśaṅkā kena vāryate?
analyzed: bhavati ayam aśābdasya api jñānasya gocaraḥ iti pramāṇa antara āśaṅkā kena vāryate
na ca pramāṇa antara avagamya tā śabda artham anupraviśati
yatas na anvaya mātreṇa vyatireka mātreṇa vā śabda arthaḥ

original: sati hyanyasmin prayojake 'rthe yasyābhāve na prayogaḥ so 'pi tasya śabdasya prayojaka iti gamyate,
analyzed: sati hi anyasmin prayojake arthe yasya abhāve na prayogaḥ saḥ api tasya śabdasya prayojakaḥ iti gamyate

original: yathā satsu hetvantareṣu yasyābhāve na kāryaṃ so 'pi heturgamyate /
analyzed: yathā satsu hetu antareṣu yasya abhāve na kāryam saḥ api hetuḥ gamyate
iha ca śreyaḥ hetu vivakṣāyām liṅga ādeḥ darśanāt
tad abhāve sati api pramāṇa antara gamya tve adarśanāt śreyaḥ hetu tvam tāvat śabda arthaḥ
pramāṇa antara gamya tve yadi api darśanam

original: na tu śreyohetutve sati pramāṇāntaragamyatāyā abhāvāt /
analyzed: na tu śreyaḥ hetu tve sati pramāṇa antara gamya tāyāḥ abhāvāt
tatra saṃdigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ
ubhaya abhāve aprayogāt kiṃnibandhanaḥ aprayogaḥ iti

original: tatra śreyaḥsādhanatāyāḥ prayojakatvasyāvadhāritatvāt [KKS_109] tadabhāve tannibandhana iti gamyate /
analyzed: tatra śreyaḥ sādhanatāyāḥ prayojaka tvasya avadhārita tvāt tad abhāve tad nibandhanaḥ iti gamyate

anyathā śiṃśapā śabda arthe sattva ādayaḥ api anupraviśeyuḥ teṣu satsu
prayogāt tad abhāve ca aprayogāt
atha śiṃśapā tvasya śabda artha tvāt tad abhāva nibandhanaḥ eva sattā ādi abhāve aprayogaḥ

original: tatsadbhāvācca prayoga upapadyata iti na teṣu sāmarthyakalpanā,
analyzed: tad sadbhāvāt ca prayogaḥ upapadyate iti na teṣu sāmarthya kalpanā
samānam etat atra api

tat asat

original: na hi ya ekatra yasya pramāṇasya gocaraḥ so 'nyatrāpi mithyā /

samīpe hi bahis indriya viṣayaḥ

original: tathā yāgādiṣu viprakṛṣṭakālaphaleṣu vedāvagamyaṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /

anantara phala anupalabdheḥ

original: tadaviṣaye tu śabdārthe na tadvirodha iti /

tat na

original: api ca viśiṣṭasiddhau viśeṣaṇamapi śreyohetutvamātraṃ siddham /

original: tadāpi pravṛttipramitastadhetupratyayo na tamantareṇetyāptavacanārthavadanumeyatā na vyāvartate /

tathā

iti

atha ucyate

original: na brūmo vidhiranyathā vṛthā syāditi tadadhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: na brūmaḥ vidhiḥ anyathā vṛthā syāt iti tad adhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ

original: kiṃ tu pramāṇāntmanaiva sa svaśabdena pratipādyate /

pramāṇa antara anapekṣaḥ ca
na hi asau śabda vat saṃbandha apekṣa tvāt pūrva siddhim apekṣate iti
tathā api asiddhe prāguktau doṣau siddhe anuvādi tā
prāmāṇyam asya yatra astu śruteḥ tatra vṛthā tu ayam
evam api avyutpanna pravṛtti pada dharma vyatikramau pramāṇa ātmā api sa yadi na pramāṇa antara siddhaḥ
atha siddhaḥ yathā avagata anuvādāt na apūrva artha ākṣepaḥ

kim anena nanu uktam

śabdaḥ ced anuvādakaḥ
tat prakāśyam pramāṇam api anūdyamānam yathā adhigatam katham apūrva artham bodhayet
na prameya saṃsparśa rahitā pramāṇa avagatiḥ
atas yathā adhigata prameyam eva tat pratīyate

original: kva ca pramāṇameṣo 'rthe na yāgādau svaśabdake // MBs_2.87 //
analyzed: kva ca pramāṇam eṣaḥ arthe na yāga ādau sva śabdake
laukike apūrva saṃsargaḥ śrotuḥ asti avidhau api
phala sādhana śaktau ced śabdaḥ tatra na dūṣyati
padārtha antara tulya tvāt vidhi ākāṅkṣā nibandhanaḥ

original: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānāṃ svaśabdaistu prakāśitāḥ // MBs_2.89 //
analyzed: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānām sva śabdaiḥ tu prakāśitāḥ
saṃbandha yogya rūpeṇa tasmāt saṃsarga bhāginaḥ
viśiṣṭa artha prayuktā hi samabhivyāhṛtiḥ jane

original: ato na viddhyabhāvena saṃsargo na prakalpate /

na ca niyogasya prameyam nirūpyate

teṣām yajati ādi śabda viṣaya tvāt

tathā hi

original: avidhiṣvapi laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śroturanadhigato 'pūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate '
analyzed: a vidhiṣu api laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śrotuḥ anadhigataḥ apūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate
brāhmaṇa putraḥ te jātaḥ ityādiṣu
atha phala sādhana sāmarthyam prameyam ucyate
na kila kāminaḥ niyogaḥ akāma upāye dhātvarthe avakalpate

original: anupāyatve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: anupāya tve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāt iti
tat api asaṃpratam
na hi śabdasya tatra kaścid aparādhaḥ
yena tam atikramya anyat pramāṇam mṛgyate
pramāṇa antara apekṣa tā pratyuktā
anantara phala adarśanena tu virodhaḥ niyoga gamye api tasmin aviśiṣṭaḥ
ānantaryasya apramāṇa artha tvena tad abhāvaḥ śabde api tulyaḥ

original: atha vā śabdastatra na duṣyati phalasādhanasāmarthye,
analyzed: atha vā śabdaḥ tatra na duṣyati phala sādhana sāmarthye

na hi tatas puruṣa artha sādhana avabodhaḥ saṃbhavati
tat ca idam vidhi viveka bhāvanā vivekābhyām avagantavyam

original: tasmāt saṃbandhajñānāpekṣatvena padārthāntaraiḥ samānatvādvidhāyakārthasya na śakyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktuṃ ---
analyzed: tasmāt saṃbandha jñāna apekṣa tvena padārtha antaraiḥ samāna tvāt vidhāyaka arthasya na śakyam viśeṣeṇa vaktum
tad nibandhanaḥ padārtha saṃsargaḥ iti

original: sarva eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandhayogyaiḥ kārakādibhāvaiḥ svapadebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante,
analyzed: sarve eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandha yogyaiḥ kāraka ādi bhāvaiḥ sva padebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante
yatas lokāt śabda vyāpāra avagamaḥ

original: loke ca [KKS_112] padaiḥ svārthānāṃ pratipādanaṃ sannikarṣeṇa viśiṣṭārthaparatayā,
analyzed: loke ca padaiḥ svārthānām pratipādanam sannikarṣeṇa viśiṣṭa artha para tayā
na sva artha mātra pratipatti para tayā
tathā ca sarva padārtha ākāṅkṣā nibandhanaḥ eva saṃsargaḥ

original: sarve hi te padairaparyavasitarūpāḥ svarūpamātre prakāśyante /
analyzed: sarve hi te padaiḥ aparyavasita rūpāḥ sva rūpa mātre prakāśyante

original: evaṃ padārthāntaraistulyatvādvidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tannibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
analyzed: evam padārtha antaraiḥ tulya tvāt vidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tad nibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ

original: sarvapadārthanibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhyabhāvena saṃsargo nopapadyate /
analyzed: sarva padārtha nibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhi abhāvena saṃsargaḥ na upapadyate

original: viparītā tu khyātiḥ saṃnihitasya rajatatāmabhūtāṃ rajatasya vā saṃnihitatāmādarśayantī prasañjayati /

anāśvāsaḥ jñāyamāne jñānena eva apabādhyate
vyabhicārāt asāmarthyam na tad kāryasya lābhataḥ
vyabhicārāt prameya tve kāryam eva na labhyate

original: yo hi jñāyamāne 'rthe 'nyathāpi syādityanāśvāsastasya tenaiva jñānena tathātvaparicchedinotpattirnirudhyate /

tathā hi
anāśvāsa nivṛttaye tadvidham jñānam eva apekṣyate
tat ca asti eva
na ca vyabhicāra doṣāt asamartha pramāṇam jñānam iti yujyate
pramāṇa kāryasya paricchedasya jñāna rūpāt eva siddha tvāt
paricchedataḥ hi prāmāṇyam
atantra tā tu vyabhicāra avyabhicārayoḥ
asati tasmin dhūma ādeḥ avyabhicārasya api apramāṇa tvāt

original: vyabhicāravato 'pi ca sitāsitādiṣu cakṣuṣaḥ sati tasmin prāmāṇyāt /
analyzed: vyabhicāravataḥ api ca sita asita ādiṣu cakṣuṣaḥ sati tasmin prāmāṇyāt

original: na ca vyabhicāro bādhaheturdoṣavat prāmāṇyopaghātī kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: na ca vyabhicāraḥ bādha hetuḥ doṣa vat prāmāṇya upaghātī kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādau vyabhicāravati pramāṇa tvāt
nanu dṛṣṭaḥ vyabhicāraḥ prāmāṇya upaghātī prameya tva ūrdhva tva ādau
na etat sāram
na tatra vyabhicārāt aprāmāṇyam
api tu pariccheda kārya abhāvāt
tad abhāvaḥ ca hetu abhāvāt
avyabhicārāt hi liṅgāt liṅgi paricchedaḥ

original: yatra tvavyabhicāro na kāraṇaṃ tatra vyabhicāre 'pi sati paricchede prāmāṇyamavivādam /
analyzed: yatra tu avyabhicāraḥ na kāraṇam tatra vyabhicāre api sati paricchede prāmāṇyam avivādam
akṣeṣu tadvat eva ca jñānam pariccheda nimittam
na liṅga vat
na ca saṃśaya utpattyā vyabhicāraḥ prāmāṇyam upahanti
samyak paricchinne dvaividhyasya asaṃśaya hetu tvāt
na niścite sthāṇau ūrdhva tvena saṃśerate
utpattyā eva jñānam artham avadhārayati
an avadhārakam tu na eva iha adhikṛtam
evam ca avadhāraṇāt eva anavadhāraṇam iti vipratiṣiddham
yaḥ eva tu avyabhicāram arthayate jñānasya āśvāsa artham tasya eva anāśvāsaḥ
avyabhicāra jñāne api anāśvāsāt
na hi tat asiddha vyabhicāram ātmani jñāna antareṣu ca āśvāsa kāraṇam
jñāna antarāt siddhau anavasthā
api ca jñāna rūpāt ced na artha āśvāsaḥ
tasya asiddhau kena saha avyabhicāraḥ jñānasya gṛhyeta
kim ca jñāna rūpāt eva avyabhicāraḥ api kathyate
viparīta khyātau tad virodhāt
tathā sati tat eva viṣayasya sādhakam
vyarthaḥ avyabhicāraḥ
na ca vyabhicāraḥ prāmāṇyam upahanti iti uktam
api ca agrahaṇe abhīṣṭam yat viveka nibandhanam
na parāṇudyate daṇḍaiḥ tad viparyaya darśane
na udreka hetavaḥ doṣāḥ kārya sāmarthya ghātinaḥ
graha agraha vibhāgaḥ syāt atas tad sat asat tvataḥ
viparyaye hi nitarām upaghātaḥ prakalpate
iṣṭa kārya uparodhena viparīta udayena ca
tasmāt tad sat asat tvābhyām vivekaḥ atrā api kalpate
doṣe asatya graha āśaṅkā katham ca vinivartate
na hi kāraṇa sadbhāve kārya sattā niyogataḥ

original: pratyakṣaṃ kāryamevaṃ ca hetunānumitaṃ bhavet // MBs_2.156 //
analyzed: pratyakṣam kāryam evam ca hetunā anumitam bhavet
viparyaye phala abhāvaḥ hetu abhāvāt tu yujyate
viveka upāyaḥ ca doṣa abhāva bhāvau grahaṇa agrahaṇayoḥ na daṇḍa vāritau
viparyaye viparyaya hetavaḥ abhyupaghātakāḥ
sutarām iṣṭa kārya uparodhāt viparīta udayāt ca
na ca aduṣṭeṣu api indriya ādiṣu agraha āśaṅkā nivṛttiḥ
yatas hetu bhāve api na niyogataḥ kāryam
viparyayaḥ ca syāt
pratyakṣa asaṃvittiḥ hetunā anumīyeta
phalāt tu hetoḥ hetu bhāva anumānam
doṣa abhāvāt tu viparyaya kārya asattvam yukta anumānam
hetu abhāve kārya anutpādāt
anālambana tā āpattiḥ yathā ākāra antara arpaṇam
sva rūpa anarpaṇāt evam bhavet agrahaṇe api te

original: kasyacittvarpaṇaṃ tulyamatha tatra na tattathā // MBs_2.158 //

jñānāt jñeyasya kaḥ anyaḥ arthaḥ sva rūpa pratibhāsanāt

original: adṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā na ca dṛṣṭasya saṃbhave /

na tu
evaṃvidhaḥ ātmā iti
tatra ucyate

vrīhīn prokṣati iti prokṣaṇa vidheḥ eva vrīhiṣu adṛṣṭa saṃskāra avagamaḥ prokṣaṇa viṣayāt api
na anyathā vrīhi arthe prokṣaṇe kartavya tā yujyate

original: na hi tatra kiñcidakurvatprokṣaṇaṃ tadarthaṃ kṛtaṃ syādityevaṃ vidherevādṛṣṭasaṃskārasadbhāvasiddhiḥ,

original: nānyathā svargakāmasya yāgakartavyatāpratītiryujyate yadi na svargopāyo yāgaḥ /

original: anuṣṭhito 'pi na svargakāmenānuṣṭhito bhavatīti kriyāviṣayādapi vidheḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamaḥ śābdaḥ ---
analyzed: anuṣṭhitaḥ api na svarga kāmena anuṣṭhitaḥ bhavati iti kriyā viṣayāt api vidheḥ sādhya sādhana bhāva avagamaḥ śābdaḥ
tathā jñāna viṣayāt api vidheḥ ātma rūpa bodhaḥ

atadvidhaḥ ced ātmā tena jñānena pratīyate iti
ukta uttaram idam yasmāt arūpeṇa api bhāsakam

original: jñānaṃ pradarśitaṃ na syādanyathā tadvidheḥ phalam /

anyathā khyātiḥ tu

a sthūlam an aṇu a hrasvam ityādi padārthaiḥ saṃsargāt bhedāt ca pramāṇa antara anadhigatam viśeṣa rūpam āsādayati
vākyasya ca prameyam bhavati
tat evam loka siddha padārtha anvayena eva apūrva artha pratipatteḥ na anavabodhaka tvam anuvādaka tvam vā
sarva pratyaya vedye vā brahma rūpe vyavasthite
prapañcasya pravilayaḥ śabdena pratipādyate
pravilīna prapañcena tad rūpeṇa na gocaraḥ
māna antarasya iti matam āmnāya eka nibandhanam
athavā na loke atyantam aprasiddham brahma
sarva pratyaya vedya tvāt
brahmaṇaḥ vyatirekeṇa pratyetavyasya abhāvāt
viśeṣa pratyayānām ca sāmānya rūpa anugamāt
bheda upasaṃhāra avaśiṣṭam ca satyam brahma
iti pratipādanāt
avācā ārambhaṇam vikāraḥ nāmadheyam mṛttikā iti eva satyam
iti dṛṣṭāntāt
kim tarhi śabdena pratipādyate
prapañca abhāvaḥ
tatra prapañca padārthaḥ api siddhaḥ
niṣedhaḥ api siddhaḥ
tayoḥ saṃsargāt tad abhāva pratipattiḥ
āmnāya eka nibandhana tvam tu tasya ucyate
pratyakṣa ādīnām avidyā saṃbhinna tvāt
pratyasta mita nikhila bhedena rūpeṇa a viṣayīkaraṇāt bheda pratyasta mayasya āmnāya avagamya tvāt iti
paraḥ punar pratyavatiṣṭhate
nanu ca apuruṣa artha tvam bhūta niṣṭhe prasajyate

original: yat khalu vākyaṃ na puruṣaṃ kvaciddhitasādhane pravartayati ahitasādhanācca [KKS_158] nivartayati,
analyzed: yat khalu vākyam na puruṣam kvacid hita sādhane pravartayati ahita sādhanāt ca nivartayati
kevalam siddham artham anvācaṣṭe
tat a puruṣa artham
a puruṣa artha tvāt ca unmatta pralāpa vat apramāṇam
tathā ca prāyeṇa vedāntāḥ
ucyate
pramāṇasya na ca etāvat puruṣa artha eka niṣṭha tā
upekṣām api hi phalam pramāṇasya pracakṣate
anena śloka ardhena atra bhavitavyam iti abhyūhaḥ
param tu mātṛkāsu na dṛśyate
e t itoḥ

original: api cājñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate // MBs_4.6 //
analyzed: api ca ajñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate
tad nivṛttiḥ ca vijñānam puruṣa arthaḥ svayam matam
kasmiṃścid arthe vijñāte kutūhalavatām nṛṇām
ākulānām jñāna janma puruṣa artha tva saṃmatam
akṣa ādau ca yathā rūpa niṣṭhe na a puruṣa artha tā

original: na ca pravṛttiniṣṭhatvaṃ tathāsmin kena vāryate /
analyzed: na ca pravṛtti niṣṭha tvam tathā asmin kena vāryate

original: jñeyasya puruṣārthatvaṃ tatra cedatra tatsamam // MBs_4.9 //
analyzed: jñeyasya puruṣa artha tvam tatra ced atra tat samam
puruṣa arthaḥ svayam brahma praśāntam vijarā ādikam
atas tat tvam asi iti evam anuśiṣyāya śiṣyate
para pravṛtteḥ aṅga tvam pratyakṣa ādeḥ matam yadi
atrā api sākṣāt karaṇa pravṛttau aṅga tā iṣyatām
na tāvat niyogataḥ pramāṇasya puruṣa artha phala tā
na khalu hita upādāna ahita hāne eva pramāṇa phale
upekṣām api hi pramāṇa phalam pramāṇa vidaḥ ācakṣate
na ca puruṣa artha tā pramāṇa lakṣaṇam
tasmāt na puruṣa artha abhāvena aprāmāṇyam
api ca 'śokī aham duḥkhī aham
a dhana ādīni mama naṣṭāni iti viśuddha brahma ātmanaḥ jīvasya mithyājñānam
tat sva rūpeṇa eva puruṣa arthaḥ
aniṣṭa nivṛtti rūpa tvāt iṣṭa āvirbhāvāt ca

original: yadyapi ca saṃskārāttasyānuvṛttistathāpi śābdajñānamanusaṃtanvato viduṣo na pūrvavadbhavati nivartate cātyantāya /
analyzed: yadi api ca saṃskārāt tasya anuvṛttiḥ tathā api śābda jñānam anusaṃtanvataḥ viduṣaḥ na pūrvavat bhavati nivartate ca atyantāya

original: dṛṣṭā ca jñānotpattereva puruṣārthatā kvacit kutūhalākulitānāmajñāte'rthe /
analyzed: dṛṣṭā ca jñāna utpatteḥ eva puruṣa artha tā kvacid kutūhala ākulitānām ajñāte arthe
na hi tad jñānāt param anyat arthyate
na ca pravṛtti nivṛtti viṣayasya eva puruṣa artha tā iti niyamaḥ
pratyakṣa ādīni hi pramāṇāni
na ca tāvat pravṛtti nivṛtti parāṇi siddha vastu viṣayāṇi
na ca puruṣa artha tām jahati
yadi matam

original: pratyakṣādijñeyaṃ hi siddhaṃ vastu puruṣārthaḥ salilādiḥ,
analyzed: pratyakṣa ādi jñeyam hi siddham vastu puruṣa arthaḥ salila ādiḥ
tad upakārāt
tatas pratyakṣa ādīnām puruṣa artha tā bhūta niṣṭhānām api

original: atrāpi ca śabdaprameyaṃ svayameva brahma puruṣārtho jarādivividhāśivopaśamāt paramānandaprakāśatvācca suprasannam /
analyzed: atrā api ca śabda prameyam svayam eva brahma puruṣa arthaḥ jarā ādi vividha aśiva upaśamāt paramānanda prakāśa tvāt ca su prasannam
atas eva 'tat tvam asi iti śvetaketu mukhena āśāsanīyāya puruṣāya śrutyā abhinnam upadiśyate
abhinnam hi tat anuśāsanīyāt
bhedena ca pratīyamānam na puruṣa arthaḥ

original: tattve tādātmyajñāne ca tathābhāvāt viśvāśivopaśamāt paramaśivabhāvācca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣārtho āpto bhavati /
analyzed: tattve tādātmya jñāne ca tathā bhāvāt viśva āśiva upaśamāt paramaśiva bhāvāt ca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ āptaḥ bhavati
yadi matam
pratyakṣa ādīni api pravṛti aṅgāni eva
pramite arthe hāna upādāna ādi lakṣaṇāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ tad mūla tvāt
īdṛśam pravṛti aṅga tvam atra api asti eva
śabdāt pramite brahmaṇi sākṣātkaraṇāya pravṛtteḥ iṣṭa tvāt iti
eṣā vedānta tattva pravicaya catura prasphurat nyāya tejā
mārgam mukteḥ nirundhat nibiḍam api tamaḥ anādi nirdārayantī
sadyas prakṣālayantī ghanam api jagatām tīrtha dustarka paṅkam
iti maṇḍanamiśrāṇām kṛtiḥ brahmasiddhiḥ samāptā
